name: CBIdentityAuthority
desc: An identity authority is a database that stores information about identities. The CBIdentityAuthority class defines one or more identity authorities. This database can be searched for identities in conjunction with the CBIdentity class factory methods.

items.name: var localizedName: String
items.desc: Returns the localized name of the identity authority.

items.name: class func local() -> CBIdentityAuthority
items.desc: Returns the identity authority on the local system.

items.name: class func managed() -> CBIdentityAuthority
items.desc: Returns the identity authority that contains all the identities in bound network directory servers.

items.name: class func `default`() -> CBIdentityAuthority
items.desc: Returns an identity authority that contains the identities in both the local and the network-bound authorities.
